text.page:
531
101-266a @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+h+wa dza a gra ke yU ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas

532
101-266b dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams las pham/ rab tu pham nas de rtab cing rings pa'i gzugs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di ltar lha ma yin dang g.yul bkye ba las/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris las pham/ rab tu pham ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang pham/ rab tu pham na bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po khyod kyis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs zung shig /ngas kyang sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan las 'di mnos so/ /mnos nas kyang gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bshad do/ /mngon par dran te de tshun chad 'jigs pa'am/ bag tsha ba'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa'am/ tha na skad cig yud tsam yang lus la gnod pa byung ma myong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bgyi ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ dza ya bA hi ni/ shang ka ri shang ka ri/ pra b+haM ka ri/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sarba shatrU~M/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ b+ha ga ba te/ dza ya bA hi ni/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ gra sa gra sa/ ha sa ha sa/ hU~M hU~M/ la hU~M la hU~M/ la m+bo da ri/ tri ne tre/

533
101-267a tsa tu ra bAk+t+re/ tsa tu da daMSh+Te/ tsa tur b+hu dze/ a si mu sa la/ tsakra tri shU la/ badzra ka ba tsa d+hA ra Ni/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /o~M b+ha ga ba ti/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ pa ra se+en+ya~M bi d+hAn+sa ya/ sarba sha trU~M nA sha ya/ d+h+wa dza a gra ke yU re/ tri Ta tri Ta tri Ta/ b+h+ri Ta b+h+ri Ta/ u lkA mu khi/ u lkA d+hA ra NI/ tre+e lo kya ma thA ni/ bi d+h+wan+sa ya pa ra se+en+yan/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ ka~M pa ka~M pa/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ aT+Ta hA saM/ bi d+h+wan+sa ya pa ra se+e n+yan/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /trA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+h+rA ma ya b+h+rA ma ya/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/ d+harma sat+ye na/ saM g+ha sat+ye na/ sa t+ya bA di nA~M/ sa t+ye na/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye mA ti kra ma/ d+harma sa t+ye mA ti kra ma/ saM g+ha sa t+ye mA ti kra ma/ sat+ya bA di nA~M/ sat+ya mA ti kra ma/ lam+bo da ri/ lam+bo da ri/ ku Ta ku Ta/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ kuT+TA ba ya kuT+TA pa ya/ ru dra ma nA ya/ biSh+Nu ma nA ya/ tsan+d+ra sUr+ya prah+ma ma nA ya/ tre+e lo kya a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ sarba de ba a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa/ ga na d+harba/ ku~M b+haN+Da/ ma ho ra ga a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ bi d+h+wan+sa ya pa ra sin+ya~M/ raM ga raM ga/ raM gA pa ya raM gA pa ya/ dz+wA la dz+wA la/ puSh+pa mA li ni/ run+d+ha run+d+ha/ ri ti ri ti/ tsi ti tsi ti/ d+h+ri ti d+h+ri ti/ b+h+r-i ku Ti mu kha pa ra/ se na ku lot+sA da ni ka ri/ ha la ha la/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ he he/ ri Ni ri Ni/ ri Ni ma ti/ dza~M b+ha d+h+wa dze/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a ba lo ki te/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo ki te swA hA/

534
101-267b gu Na rA dza pra b+hA sot+ta me swA hA/ sUr+ya arka bi ma le swA hA/ tsan+d+ra arka bi ma le swA hA/ sarba gra ha na k+Sha tra d+he mI ka ra Ne swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ lha'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'dis khyod g.yul sprod pa'am/ 'thab pa'am/ rtsod pa'am/ 'gyed pa'am/ gang du 'gro yang rung ste mi 'jigs shing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'am/ mgul du btags na mi'i rgyal po dang / skyes bu dpa' bo thams cad la srung bar byed do/ /bud med kyi gzugs lta bur bsgyur nas mdun du 'dug ste mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing srung bar byed/ dpal skyed par byed/ pha rol gyi sde spa 'gong bar byed/ bkra shis pa dang / gtsang ba dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa kun du gnas par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //
